casebody.data:
Northfield Homes, Inc., Appellant, v. Village of Northfield, Appellee.

[Cite as Northfield Homes, Inc. v. Northfield (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 259.]

(No. 97-2531 Submitted February 18, 1998 Decided March 11, 1998.) Kenneth J. Fisher Co., L.P.A., Kenneth J. Fisher and Robert G. Mansour; Williams & Batchelder and William G. Batchelder III, for appellant. Joseph W. Diemert, Jr., Director of Law, and Bradric T. Bryan, Assistant Director of Law, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Goldberg Cos., Inc. v. Richmond Hts. City Council (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 207, 690 N.E.2d 510, decided today.

*260Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents.
